name: Dimidium Angelus
description:
Born as a half-demon half-angel, you were neglected your place in heaven. They said you could only live there if Lucifer was extinguished. That's exactly what you're going to do.

Seize the agonizing souls of hell, accumulate sins, unlock attacks and skills and go deeper in hell to face your biggest enemy.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48.

Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/archaon-15

Latim dictionary: https://www.math.ubc.ca/~cass/frivs/latin/latin-dict-full.html
